name: Jquery-image-carousel
body: Jquery Image Carousel ===================== A WordPress plugin implemented as a shortcode for creating a slideshow right from the posts screen. ## How to use Using this plugin is as easy as 1. Upload a bunch of images to a post. 2. Put the word [carousel] somewhere in the body of the post. 3. Publish or preview your post. ![An example of a carousel.](http://asianwomenblog.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/04/Screen-shot-2012-04-20-at-10.38.30-AM.png)
tagline: A WordPress plugin implemented as a shortcode for creating a slideshow right from the posts screen.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
